description: Looking for a vegetarian centrepiece to wow your guests? This whole roasted cauliflower recipe with homemade hummus will be the star of the show.
keywords: Whole Roasted Cauliflower With Hummus & Crispy Chickpeas
name: Whole Roasted Cauliflower With Hummus & Crispy Chickpeas Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spread hummus on a large serving plate. Carefully transfer cauliflower to plate. Scatter crispy chickpeas and over half of the tomato mixture. Drizzled with remaining oil and serve with remaining tomato mixture.
